channel.title: Real PRO Coders... Look at this

item.title: Real PRO Coders... Look at this
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("getcolor"))
{
  int itemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(9));
  BufferedReader list = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./List.dat"));
  String data = new String();
     while ((data = list.readLine()) != null) {
         if(data.startsWith(command.substring(9))) {
             int itemCOL = data.substring(itemID.length+1);
     }      }
}

Untested.
Now just dump a file with the info needed with this layout:

ITEMID:COLOR
Make as many lines as items you need for this.

Read full topic
item.source: Real PRO Coders... Look at this

item.title: Real PRO Coders... Look at this
item.dc:creator: @newservermaker newservermaker
item.description:
@newservermaker wrote:

Alright. Ill get right to the point.

I am looking for a group of PRO coders to help me in my goal.

What is my goal you ask? My goal is to make a command so players and client/server makers can get the exact color ID’s from a item.

I have spent the last 5 days looking at codes and learning java. So heres what i have so far:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“getcolors”)
{
try{
Int newItemIDcolors = interget.parseInt(command.substring(7,13));
if (/*newItemID <= 25000 && */itemColors = 5
} Else {
sendMessage(“Sorry… You need to enter it right”);
}

}
{catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(" Sorry… try agein");
}[/code]

THE CODE WILL NOT WORK SO DONT BOTHER PLACING INTO A CLIENT OR SERVER!

Now, Lets get down to buisness shall we?

If you want to help me please add me on MSN and message me at:

My E-Mail

I hope you all will come and help me take a step towards making a new code for the pros!

Read full topic
